home_bio: I am a creative, responsible, respectful and committed person with the ability to work both in a team and individually, with the openness to have new experiences and learn of them, both in the professional and personal environment.
education_1_desc: Liceo Sinaí High School Peréz Zeledón, San Isidro del General. Completion of the International Baccalaureate Diploma Program.
education_2_desc: Universidad Nacional de Costa Rica Heredia, Costa Rica. Completion of the Diploma in computer applications programming.
education_3_desc: Universidad Nacional de Costa Rica Heredia, Costa Rica. I have carried out different projects of courses of my career that help to improve the management of different software and create solutions to certain problems that arise.
p1_title: HR Payroll System - PHP Developer - Laravel
p1_subtitle: A detailed showcase of my design and development work
p1_desc_1: It is a spreadsheet system designed to completely transform the operational efficiency of the company. Unlike manual methods, the system automates processes, eliminating repetitive and error-prone tasks, allowing the team to focus on higher-value activities.
p1_desc_2: This system is specially designed for companies that offer accounting services and is completely multi-company, allowing you to efficiently manage the spreadsheets of multiple clients from a single platform. The software consists of the development of a Comprehensive Payroll System that integrates with the PostgreSQL-based accounting system and the existing vacation system. Figma was used to create the system proposal.
p1_desc_3:
Company Overview: Outsourcing company specializing in software development.
• Developed a payroll system using PHP and the Laravel framework, incorporating the Moonshine library.
• Applied the MVC architecture by managing routes, controllers, models, and resources.
• Performed basic operations with PostgreSQL databases, including queries and modifications via phpMyAdmin.
• Specialized in FrontEnd development and project structuring while collaborating with team members using Scrum methodology for effective communication and project development.
p2_subtitle: A detailed showcase of my design work
p2_desc_1: Creation of materials for a virtual clothing store on Instagram, from t-shirt designs to advertising, are made with programs such as Photoshop, Premiere Pro and Illustrator.
p3_subtitle: A detailed showcase of my design work
p3_desc_1: Creation of materials for a university project that consists of implementing STEAM education in schools and colleges, promoting a dynamic and different education, from banner designs to logos and videos for the project, they are made with programs such as Photoshop, Premiere Pro, Illustrator and After Effects.
